long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use your own ChatGPT to summarize and translate web articles into concise, publish-ready paragraphs on the same page. Perfect for multilingual content creators looking to curate news, blogs, and reviews, or for those seeking quick reads.
